subject: Add login with Google
content: I think it would be great if you could login with Google

subject: Add login with Github
content: I think it would be great if you could login with Github

subject: Add Dark Mode
content: I think it would be great if you could add a Dark Mode option for better user experience during nighttime.

subject: Incorrect Date Display
content: I've noticed an issue with the date display on certain pages. It would be helpful to have this corrected for accurate information.

subject: Implement Dark Mode
content: It would be awesome if you could add a Dark Mode feature for better user experience.

subject: Incorrect Display of Usernames
content: I noticed a bug where usernames are not displayed correctly in certain sections of the application.

subject: Enhance Search Functionality
content: Consider improving the search functionality to make it more intuitive and efficient.

subject: Unable to Upload Profile Picture
content: Encountered a bug preventing me from uploading a new profile picture. Please investigate.
